name: Saloni Narang
tagline: Docker Captain, CNCF Ambassador, and co-founder of KubeSimplify simplifying cloud-native
bio: Saloni Narang is a Docker Captain, CNCF Ambassador, and Co-founder of KubeSimplify. She simplifies complex cloud-native and Kubernetes concepts through videos, blogs, livestreams, and meetups. A sought-after speaker at KubeCon EU & NA, she has organized workshops across India and creates deep-dive content for Kubernetes, DevOps, and AI.
